select sku.id,sku.sku_code,sku.sku_name,sku.product_id,sku.thumb_img,sku.sale_price,sku.market_price,sku.cost_price,sku.sku_spec,sku.weight,sku.volume,sku.status,sku.create_time,sku.update_time,sku.del_flag, ss.sale_num from product_sku sku left join product p on p.id = sku.product_id left join sku_stock ss on ss.sku_id = sku.id
and sku.sku_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') and p.brand_id = #{brandId} and p.category1_id = #{category1Id} and p.category2_id = #{category2Id} and p.category3_id = #{category3Id} and p.status = 1 and p.audit_status = 1 and sku.del_flag = 0 and p.del_flag = 0 and ss.del_flag = 0
order by ss.sale_num desc order by sku.sale_price asc order by sku.sale_price desc

select sku.id,sku.sku_code,sku.sku_name,sku.product_id,sku.thumb_img,sku.sale_price,sku.market_price,sku.cost_price,sku.sku_spec,sku.weight,sku.volume,sku.status,sku.create_time,sku.update_time,sku.del_flag, ss.sale_num from product_sku sku left join product p on p.id = sku.product_id left join sku_stock ss on ss.sku_id = sku.id where p.status = 1 and p.audit_status = 1 and sku.del_flag = 0 and p.del_flag = 0 and ss.del_flag = 0 order by ss.sale_num desc limit 20
